scenario_text.value: Ah, Takuma! Over there, I see Miu!
You’re right! Come on, let’s go!
Miu? What’s wrong? Why are you crying?
Oh nooo! Are you okay? Are you hurt?!
No, I’m not injured or anything!
It’s just... I had a fight with Shakomon.
A fight with Shakomon...? But why...?

It’s just... She started saying really nasty
things out of the blue, so... *sniff*

(It’s too weird to imagine anyone as buddy-
buddy as them having a fight.)
(I’m guessing that wasn’t the real Shakomon.)
